name: Ancient Apocalypse
description:
The location is ancient rome, in a time lost to man,  stolen by disease and your supplies are dwindling,  Fight the hoards of roman zombies whilst trying to live off the rest of your rations, maybe even others'.

Music : Endrit Special Productions

Coding/Programming : Jakarian Studios

Audio : Jakarian Studios

Textures : Endrit Special Productions

Engine : Clickteam Fusion 2.5
